channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Traffic Collision; INC#1005; 02:20PM; SB 405 Fwy x Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48hlXBl; #VanNuys; Contrary to initial reports to CHP from multiple 9-1-1 callers, the vehicle is now best described as a full size commercial dump truck.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC15 E275 E288 E290 E39 E88 EM10 HR3 RA39 RA7 RA83 RA839 RA878 T75 T88 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 12/12/2023 INC#1005

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1005; 02:00PM; SB 405 Fwy x Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48hlXBl; #VanNuys; LAFD Firefighters worked swiftly to assure the less than 20 gallons of fuel spilled on the hillside from a tank on the overturned truck, did not ignite or enter a storm drain, as their LAFD colleagues skillfully used hand and power tools to safely extricate the seriously injured adult male driver from his overturned box truck (undetermined cargo) that tumbled over-the-side and off the freeway. The man, trapped nearly 30 minutes in the wreckage, has been transported in undetermined condition to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. Media Inquiries: CHP West Valley (No Log Number Available).; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC15 E275 E288 E290 E39 E88 EM10 HR3 RA39 RA7 RA83 RA839 RA878 T75 T88 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1005; 01:23PM; SB 405 Fwy x Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48hlXBl; Van Nuys; PRELIM: Solo box truck over-the-side, off the freeway. One patient trapped. ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC15 E275 E288 E290 E39 E88 EM10 HR3 RA7 RA83 RA839 RA878 T75 T88 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Outside Fire; INC#1349; 04:30PM; 1149 W 37th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RfbI9L; #ExpositionPark; 36 LAFD Firefighters quickly accessed, confined and extinguished a large outside fire that was threatening a detached garage/shed and a two-story residential fourplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E46 RA15 RA246 SO1 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fire; INC#1349; 04:13PM; 1149 W 37th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RfbI9L; #ExpositionPark; PRELIM: Large outside fire threatening a detached garage and a two-story residential fourplex.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E46 RA15 RA246 SO1 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0449; 07:57AM; 687 W 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4atfg11; #SanPedro; The first arriving 18 LAFD Firefighters took just eight minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire in a detached one-story home. LAFD responders were able to prevent flames from extending into the adjacent two-story garden style apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA848 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0449; 07:49AM; 687 W 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4atfg11; #SanPedro; PRELIM: One story detached home to the rear of property, well involved with fire, flames threatening an adjacent two-story garden style apartment building. ; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA848 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1314; 05:10PM; 2731 E Winter St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NlWkr4; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. Situation update to 500 sq ft back house fully involved with exposures on three sides. Firefighters defended the exposures while extinguishing the fire. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E16 E2 E202 E447 E458 RA17 RA25 SO1 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1314; 04:54PM; 2731 E Winter St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NlWkr4; Boyle Heights; Single family dwelling with heavy fire showing and at least two other buildings exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E16 E2 E202 E447 E458 RA17 RA25 SO1 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0914; 01:18PM; 589 N Los Liones Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TiZfnS; Pacific Palisades; Firefighters located an adult female hiker with a lower leg injury. Due to her injury and location, LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist operation. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:59PM. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E23 E269 H0C H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
